biotools.summary: Cell-Typing using Variance Adjusted Mahalanobis Distances with Multi-Labeling. Creates multi-label cell-types for single-cell RNA-sequencing data based on weighted VAM scoring of cell-type specific gene sets.

bioschemas.name: CAMML
bioschemas.summary: Cell-Typing using Variance Adjusted Mahalanobis Distances with Multi-Labeling. Creates multi-label cell-types for single-cell RNA-sequencing data based on weighted VAM scoring of cell-type specific gene sets.
